US-401.summary: Create a vehicle lease quotation with pricing parameters
US-401.description: As a dealer user, I want to create a lease quotation by selecting vehicle, mileage, duration and down payment, so that I can propose a compliant offer to the customer.
US-401.acceptance_criteria:
AC1: The system calculates monthly rent based on vehicle price, mileage and duration.
AC2: The quotation must include residual value and total cost of leasing.
AC3: Invalid pricing parameters must be rejected with a clear business message.

US-402.summary: Apply dealer discount with approval rules
US-402.description: As a dealer user, I want to apply a discount on a quotation, so that I can adjust pricing within allowed commercial rules.
US-402.acceptance_criteria:
AC1: Discounts below the threshold are automatically accepted.
AC2: Discounts above the threshold require manager approval.
AC3: Discount approval decisions must be auditable.

US-403.summary: Perform credit decision with audit trail
US-403.description: As a back office user, I want to receive a credit decision for a lease application, so that financial risk is assessed before contract signature.
US-403.acceptance_criteria:
AC1: Credit decision is received from an external provider.
AC2: Decision outcome is stored with a timestamp.
AC3: Rejected decisions must include a reason code.

US-404.summary: Capture customer KYC data with PII masking
US-404.description: As a compliance officer, I want customer personal data to be handled securely, so that PII is not exposed in logs or technical traces.
US-404.acceptance_criteria:
AC1: Customer identity data is stored securely.
AC2: PII must be masked in application logs.
AC3: Access to sensitive fields must be restricted.

US-405.summary: Generate and sign leasing contract with document pack
US-405.description: As a customer, I want to sign my leasing contract digitally, so that the agreement is legally binding.
US-405.acceptance_criteria:
AC1: Contract PDF pack is generated from the quotation.
AC2: Digital signature workflow must complete successfully.
AC3: Signed contract is archived.

US-406.summary: Amend an existing contract and trigger repricing
US-406.description: As a back office user, I want to amend mileage or duration on an active contract, so that pricing is recalculated correctly.
US-406.acceptance_criteria:
AC1: Mileage change triggers a repricing.
AC2: Amendment history is tracked.
AC3: Customer must be notified of the new pricing.

US-407.summary: Generate first invoice and payment schedule
US-407.description: As a finance user, I want the system to generate the first invoice and payment schedule, so that billing is accurate.
US-407.acceptance_criteria:
AC1: First invoice amount matches the signed contract.
AC2: Payment schedule is generated for the full duration.
AC3: Invoice data is exportable.

US-408.description: As a customer, I want to request an early termination quote, so that I understand the financial impact.
